data.price: 82. Биз мўминлар учун шифо ва раҳмат бўлган Қуръон оятларини нозил қилурмиз. (Лекин бу оятлар) золим-кофир кимсаларга фақат зиённи зиёда қилур.
data.arabic: وَنُنَزِّلُ مِنَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ مَا هُوَ شِفَآءٞ وَرَحۡمَةٞ لِّلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَلَا يَزِيدُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا خَسَارٗا

meta.transliteration: wanunazzilu mina al-qur'āni mā huwa shifāon waraḥmatun lil'mu'minīna walā yazīdu al-ẓālimīna illā khasāran

dua.name: Dua for Emotional Healing
dua.significanceReason: Seeks spiritual and emotional healing, relief from psychological distress. Frequently used for mental health and emotional well-being.

version.title: Uzbek translation - Alauddin Mansour
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Alauddin Mansour, printed in 1430 H. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
